title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 479.2 - Participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 479.2 - Participation

State Regulations

The Department of Environmental Conservation as a
contracting agency, as defined in Executive Order No. 125, will participate in
and comply with the activities and procedures of such contracting agencies, pursuant to the implementing procedures of the Council of Contracting Agencies
titled

Council of Contracting Agencies, Executive Order No. 125, Procedures for Collection and Exchange of Information Relating to Contracting

Responsibility
and its attachments, which was adopted and published by
the Council of Contracting Agencies on January 11, 1990. Copies of this
incorporated document and its attachments may be obtained from the publisher at
the following address: Council of Contracting Agencies

Office of the Chair

The Commissioner of General Services

Mayor Erastus Corning 2nd Tower

The Governor Nelson A. Rockefeller Empire State

Plaza

Albany, New York 12242

This material is also available for public inspection and
copying at the following address: Division of Fiscal Management

Department of Environmental Conservation
625 Broadway, Room 624A
Albany, New York 12233-5010

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
479.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
